quote: Such was life that morning: nothing really mattered that much, not the good things and not the bad ones. We were in the business of mutual amusement, and we were reasonably prosperous."" (pg. 18)
quote_letters: SUCH WAS LIFE THAT MORNING NOTHING REALLY MATTERED THAT MUCH NOT THE GOOD THINGS AND NOT THE BAD ONES WE WERE IN THE BUSINESS OF MUTUAL AMUSEMENT AND WE WERE REASONABLY PROSPEROUS PG '1''8'
